VBA MACRO ThisWorkbook.cls 
in file: /home/peter/DEV/budget/vba/xl/vbaProject.bin - OLE stream: 'VBA/ThisWorkbook'
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Option Explicit

Private Sub Workbook_Open()
  Call Disabilita
  Call OpzioneProgettazione 'Modulo M1_ComandiGenerali
  If VerificaUserName Then Call EnableSpecialKey 'Modulo M98_Ribbons
  Call SelezionaFogliGrafici
  Call Centra
  Call Riabilita
End Sub

Private Sub Workbook_Activate()
  If Not ValOptTabs Then
    Call AbilitaControlloCopyPaste 'Modulo M99_GestioneCopiaIncolla
  End If
    If VerificaUserName Then Call EnableSpecialKey 'Modulo M98_Ribbons
End Sub

Private Sub Workbook_BeforeClose(Cancel As Boolean)
   Application.DisplayAlerts = False
   Call DisabilitaControlloCopyPaste 'Modulo M99_GestioneCopiaIncolla
   Call AbilitaCellDragAndDrop 'Modulo M99_GestioneCopiaIncolla
   Call DisableSpecialKey 'Modulo M98_Ribbons
   If Not ValOptTabs Then 'False = modalità utente
      Call BloccaTutto 'Modulo M1_ComandiGenerali
      LockOnTimeBeforeSave = True
      Me.Save
   End If
End Sub

Private Sub Workbook_Deactivate()
  Call DisabilitaControlloCopyPaste 'Modulo M99_GestioneCopiaIncolla
  Call DisableSpecialKey 'Modulo M98_Ribbons
End Sub

Private Sub Workbook_BeforeSave(ByVal SaveAsUI As Boolean, Cancel As Boolean)
  '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
  'Comando per modificare la Label della TAB personalizzata in caso di salvataggio del file con nome diverso
  If Not ValOptTabs Then
    If LockOnTimeBeforeSave = False Then
      Application.OnTime Now + TimeValue("0:0:1"), "'" & ThisWorkbook.Name & "'!" & "InvalidateMyCustomTab"
    End If
  End If
  '<----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
End Sub

Private Sub Workbook_SheetBeforeRightClick(ByVal sh As Object, ByVal Target As Range, Cancel As Boolean)
   Cancel = Not ValOptTabs
End Sub

Private Sub Workbook_NewSheet(ByVal sh As Object)
   If Not ValOptTabs Then Exit Sub
   If TypeName(sh) = "Worksheet" Then
      Application.ScreenUpdating = False
      With sh
         With .PageSetup
            .LeftMargin = Application.CentimetersToPoints(0.5)
            .RightMargin = Application.CentimetersToPoints(0.5)
            .BottomMargin = Application.CentimetersToPoints(1)
            .TopMargin = Application.CentimetersToPoints(1)
            .HeaderMargin = Application.CentimetersToPoints(0.5)
            .FooterMargin = Application.CentimetersToPoints(0.5)
            .CenterHorizontally = True
         End With
      End With
      Application.ScreenUpdating = True
   End If
End Sub

VBA MACRO Foglio4.cls 
in file: /home/peter/DEV/budget/vba/xl/vbaProject.bin - OLE stream: 'VBA/Foglio4'
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Option Explicit

Private Sub Worksheet_Change(ByVal Target As Range)
   If ValOptTabs Then Exit Sub
   Dim bScreenUpdating As Boolean
   Dim C As Range
   On Error GoTo Errore
   Call Disabilita
   
   If Target.Cells(1, 1).Address = Me.Range("SETTATT").Address Then
      Call ImpostaAreeReportFGPMI
   End If
   Call WsUnprotect(Me)
   For Each C In Target
   If C.Address = Me.Range("VarRicavi_anno3").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarRicavi_anno4").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarRicavi_anno5").Address Or _
      C.Address = Me.Range("VarAltriRicavi_anno3").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarAltriRicavi_anno4").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarAltriRicavi_anno5").Address Or _
      C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiMaterieV_anno3").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiMaterieV_anno4").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiMaterieV_anno5").Address Or _
      C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiMaterieF_anno3").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiMaterieF_anno4").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiMaterieF_anno5").Address Or _
      C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiServiziV_anno3").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiServiziV_anno4").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiServiziV_anno5").Address Or _
      C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiServiziF_anno3").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiServiziF_anno4").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiServiziF_anno5").Address Or _
      C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiGodimentoBeniTerzi_anno3").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiGodimentoBeniTerzi_anno4").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiGodimentoBeniTerzi_anno5").Address Or _
      C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiPersonale_anno3").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiPersonale_anno4").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCostiPersonale_anno5").Address Or _
      C.Address = Me.Range("VarOneriDiversiGestione_anno3").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarOneriDiversiGestione_anno4").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarOneriDiversiGestione_anno5").Address Or _
      C.Address = Me.Range("VarCreditiAcEntroEsSucc_anno3").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCreditiAcEntroEsSucc_anno4").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCreditiAcEntroEsSucc_anno5").Address Or _
      C.Address = Me.Range("VarCreditiAcOltreEsSucc_anno3").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCreditiAcOltreEsSucc_anno4").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarCreditiAcOltreEsSucc_anno5").Address Or _
      C.Address = Me.Range("VarDebitiEntroEsSucc_anno3").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarDebitiEntroEsSucc_anno4").Address Or C.Address = Me.Range("VarDebitiEntroEsSucc_anno5").Address Then
      If C.Value > 10 Then
         If Right(C.Text, 1) = "%" Then C.Value = C.Value * 100
         C.NumberFormat = "#,##0"
      Else
         If C.Value <> "" And Right(C.Text, 1) <> "%" Then C.Value = C.Value / 100
         C.NumberFormat = "0.00%"
      End If
  End If
  Next C
ResumeErrore:
   Call WsProtect(Me)
   Call Riabilita
   Exit Sub
Errore:
   MsgBox "Errore in  Worksheet_Change di DATI_IMPRESA!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
            "Errore n. " & Err.Number & vbCrLf & _
            Err.Description, vbCritical, "Errore in Worksheet_Change di DATI_IMPRESA"
   Resume ResumeErrore
End Sub


Private Sub Worksheet_SelectionChange(ByVal Target As Range)
   Application.ScreenUpdating = True
End Sub

in file: /home/peter/DEV/budget/vba/xl/vbaProject.bin - OLE stream: 'VBA/Foglio5'

VBA MACRO M1_Generale.bas 
in file: /home/peter/DEV/budget/vba/xl/vbaProject.bin - OLE stream: 'VBA/M1_Generale'
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Option Private Module
Option Explicit

Public Const PW = "ff2025"

Public Const sNomeFoglioIstruzioni = 1

Function VerificaUserName() As Boolean
   Const sElencoUtenti As String = "ermanno manuali"
   Dim sUserName As String
   Dim arrElencoUtenti As Variant
   Dim iMatch As Variant
   sUserName = LCase(Application.UserName)
   arrElencoUtenti = Split(sElencoUtenti, ",")
   iMatch = Application.Match(sUserName, arrElencoUtenti, 0)
   If Not IsError(iMatch) Then VerificaUserName = True
End Function



'<--- Costante da impostare per attivare o meno la limitazione temporale del file --->
'<--- True attiva la limitazione temporale                                        --->
Sub OpzioneProgettazione()
  If ValOptTabs = True Then
    Call Sproteggi
    Call ImpostaAreeReportFGPMI
    ActiveWindow.DisplayWorkbookTabs = True
    Call DisabilitaControlloCopyPaste
    Call AbilitaCellDragAndDrop
  Else
    ActiveWindow.DisplayWorkbookTabs = False
    Call AbilitaControlloCopyPaste
    Call ImpostaAreeReportFGPMI
    Call SbloccaCelle34
    'inserire prima di Call Proteggi altri comandi
    Call Proteggi
  End If
End Sub

Sub Proteggi()
  Dim ws As Worksheet, chrt As Chart
  For Each ws In ThisWorkbook.Worksheets
    Call WsProtect(ws)
  Next ws
  For Each chrt In ThisWorkbook.Charts
    chrt.Protect Password:=PW
  Next chrt
  ThisWorkbook.Protect PW, True
End Sub

Sub Sproteggi()
  Dim ws As Worksheet, chrt As Chart
  For Each ws In ThisWorkbook.Worksheets
    Call WsUnprotect(ws)
  Next ws
  For Each chrt In ThisWorkbook.Charts
    chrt.Unprotect Password:=PW
  Next chrt
  ThisWorkbook.Unprotect PW
End Sub

Sub SbloccaCelle34()
  Dim ws As Worksheet
  Dim C As Range
  For Each ws In ThisWorkbook.Worksheets
    With ws
      Call WsUnprotect(ws)
        With .Cells
          .Locked = True
          .FormulaHidden = True
        End With
        For Each C In ws.UsedRange
          With C
            If .Interior.ColorIndex = 34 Or .Interior.Color = RGB(204, 255, 255) Then
               With .MergeArea
                 .Locked = False
                 .FormulaHidden = False
               End With
            End If
          End With
        Next C
      Call WsProtect(ws)
    End With
  Next ws
End Sub

Sub WsUnprotect(ws As Worksheet)
   With ws
      If .ProtectContents Then .Unprotect PW
   End With
End Sub

Sub WsProtect(ws As Worksheet)
   If Not ValOptTabs Then
      With ws
         Select Case .Name
            'Case "DATI_IMRPESA"
            '   .Protect Password:=PW, AllowFormattingCells:=True
            Case ""
               .Protect Password:=PW, AllowFiltering:=True
            Case Else
               .Protect Password:=PW, AllowFiltering:=False
         End Select
      End With
   End If
End Sub

Sub BloccaTutto()
   Dim ws As Worksheet
   Call Disabilita
   For Each ws In ThisWorkbook.Worksheets
      With ws
         Call WsUnprotect(ws)
         With .Cells
            .Locked = True
            .FormulaHidden = True
         End With
         Call WsProtect(ws)
      End With
   Next ws
   Call Riabilita
End Sub

Sub NascondiScopriNomi()
  Dim Nome As Name
  For Each Nome In ThisWorkbook.Names
    If InStr(1, Nome.Name, "Print_Area") = 0 And _
       InStr(1, Nome.Name, "Print_Titles") = 0 Then
        Nome.Visible = Not Nome.Visible
    End If
  Next Nome
End Sub

Sub PrintNomi()
  Dim Nome As Name
  For Each Nome In ThisWorkbook.Names
    Debug.Print Nome.Name
  Next Nome
End Sub

Sub EliminaNomiNonValidi()
    Dim NomiDaEliminare As Name
    For Each NomiDaEliminare In ActiveWorkbook.Names
      Debug.Print NomiDaEliminare.Name & " - " & NomiDaEliminare.RefersToLocal & " - " & NomiDaEliminare.ValidWorkbookParameter
      If Right(NomiDaEliminare, 5) = "#REF!" Then NomiDaEliminare.Delete
    Next NomiDaEliminare
End Sub

Sub VisualizzaNascondiIntestazioni()
  Dim ws As Worksheet
  For Each ws In ThisWorkbook.Worksheets
    ws.Activate
    ActiveWindow.DisplayHeadings = Not ActiveWindow.DisplayHeadings
  Next ws
  ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(1).Activate
End Sub

Sub NascondiScopriElementiSistema()
   Dim ws As Worksheet
   On Error Resume Next
   With ThisWorkbook
      .Unprotect PW
      ' inserire di seguito il resto del codice necessario a nascondere _
        o scoprire elementi di sistema
      For Each ws In .Worksheets
         With ws
            If Not IsError(Application.Match(.Name, Split(sNomeFogliDaNascondere, ","), 0)) Then
               If .Visible = xlSheetVisible Then
                  .Visible = xlSheetVeryHidden
               Else
                  .Visible = xlSheetVisible
               End If
            End If
            Call WsUnprotect(ws)
            With .Range("RigheSistema").EntireRow
               .Hidden = Not .Hidden
            End With
            With .Range("ColonneSistema").EntireColumn
               .Hidden = Not .Hidden
            End With
            With .Range("RigheNascoste").EntireRow
               .Hidden = Not .Hidden
            End With
            With .Range("RigheDaNascondere").EntireRow
               .Hidden = Not .Hidden
            End With
         End With
      Next ws
   End With
   On Error GoTo 0
   Call InvalidateMyPRUI
End Sub

Sub Disabilita()
   With Application
      .Calculation = xlCalculationManual
      .EnableEvents = False
      .ScreenUpdating = False
      .DisplayAlerts = False
   End With
End Sub

Sub Riabilita()
   With Application
      .Calculation = xlCalculationAutomatic
      .EnableEvents = True
      .ScreenUpdating = True
      .DisplayAlerts = True
   End With
End Sub

Sub Centra()
   Dim ws As Worksheet
   Dim iUsableWidth As Double
   Dim iProspettoWidth As Double
   Dim iColonneEsterneWidth As Double
   Dim ratio As Double
   Dim NumColCentrali As Long
   Dim rngRatio As Range
   Dim dPercentualeRiduzione As Double
   Const dSandardUsableWidth As Double = 1440 'risoluzione schermo 1920x1980
   Dim ridRatio As Double
   If Application.UsableWidth >= dSandardUsableWidth Then
      ridRatio = 1
   Else
      ridRatio = 0.95
   End If
   On Error Resume Next
   'Call Disabilita
   For Each ws In ThisWorkbook.Worksheets
      With ws
         Select Case .Name
            Case "DATI_IMPRESA"
               dPercentualeRiduzione = 1.01
            Case "SP", "CE"
               dPercentualeRiduzione = 1.03
            Case "SP_CE_RIC"
               dPercentualeRiduzione = 1.02
            Case "INDICI"
               dPercentualeRiduzione = 1.01
            Case "ALTMAN"
              dPercentualeRiduzione = 1.04
            Case "RATING_FGPMI"
               dPercentualeRiduzione = 0.99
            Case "RENDICONTO_FINANZIARIO"
               dPercentualeRiduzione = 1.01
            Case "INDICI_RF"
               dPercentualeRiduzione = 0.97
            Case "DASHBOARD"
               dPercentualeRiduzione = 0.98
            Case Else
               dPercentualeRiduzione = 0.97
         End Select
         Set rngRatio = .Range("ColonneCentrali").Cells(3)
         If Err.Number = 0 Then
            NumColCentrali = .Range("ColonneCentrali").Columns.Count
            ratio = rngRatio.Width / rngRatio.ColumnWidth
            iUsableWidth = (Application.UsableWidth) / ratio
            iProspettoWidth = .Range("ColonneCentrali").Width / ratio
            If ValOptTabs Then
               iColonneEsterneWidth = 5
            Else
               iColonneEsterneWidth = Application.Max(0.5, Application.Round((iUsableWidth - iProspettoWidth) / 2 * dPercentualeRiduzione * ridRatio, 0))
            End If
            If Application.Round(.Range("ColonneCentrali").Cells(1, 1).Offset(0, -1).ColumnWidth, 0) <> Application.Round(iColonneEsterneWidth, 0) Then
               Call WsUnprotect(ws)
               .Range("ColonneCentrali").Cells(1, 1).Offset(0, -1).ColumnWidth = iColonneEsterneWidth
               .Range("ColonneCentrali").Cells(1, NumColCentrali).Offset(0, 1).ColumnWidth = iColonneEsterneWidth
               Call WsProtect(ws)
            End If
         End If
         Err.Clear
         .DisplayPageBreaks = False
      End With
   Next ws
   'Call Riabilita
   On Error GoTo 0
End Sub

Sub CreaIstruzioniPDF()
  
   Const sPathPdfIco As String = "C:\Windows\Installer\{AC76BA86-1040-1033-7760-BC15014EA700}\_PDFFile.ico" '"C:\Windows\Installer\{AC76BA86-7AD7-1040-7B44-AC0F074E4100}\PDFFile_8.ico"
   
   'Const wdFormatDocument = 1
   Const wdFormatXMLDocument = 12
   Const wdExportFormatPDF = 17
   Const wdExportOptimizeForPrint = 0
   Const wdExportAllDocument = 0
   Const wdExportDocumentContent = 0
   Const wdExportCreateNoBookmarks = 0
   
   Dim sPath As String
   Dim sFileNamePDF As String
   Dim sFileNameDoc As String
   Dim oWordApp As Object
   Dim oWordDoc As Object
   
   Dim IstruzioniPDF As Shape
   Dim IstruzioniWord As Shape
   
   If Not ValOptTabs Then Exit Sub
   
   With ThisWorkbook
   
      On Error Resume Next
      .Worksheets(sNomeFoglioIstruzioni).OLEObjects("IstruzioniPDF").Delete
      On Error GoTo 0
      
      sPath = ThisWorkbook.Path
      If sPath = "" Then sPath = Environ("Temp")
      If Right(sPath, 1) <> Application.PathSeparator Then
         sPath = sPath & Application.PathSeparator
      End If
      
      If LCase(Right(.Name, 5)) = ".xlsm" Then
         sFileNamePDF = "ISTRUZIONI-" & Left(.Name, Len(.Name) - 4) & "pdf"
         sFileNameDoc = "ISTRUZIONI-" & Left(.Name, Len(.Name) - 4) & "docx"
      Else
         sFileNamePDF = "ISTRUZIONI-" & .Name & ".pdf"
         sFileNameDoc = "ISTRUZIONI-" & .Name & ".docx"
      End If
      
      .Worksheets(sNomeFoglioIstruzioni).OLEObjects("Istruzioni").Verb xlOpen
      
      Set oWordApp = GetObject(Class:="Word.Application")
      Set oWordDoc = oWordApp.ActiveDocument
      
      oWordDoc.SaveAs2 FileName:=sPath & sFileNameDoc, _
                        FileFormat:=wdFormatXMLDocument, _
                        LockComments:=False, _
                        Password:="", _
                        AddToRecentFiles:=False, _
                        WritePassword:="", _
                        ReadOnlyRecommended:=False, _
                        EmbedTrueTypeFonts:=False, _
                        SaveNativePictureFormat:=False, _
                        SaveFormsData:=False, _
                        SaveAsAOCELetter:=False, _
                        CompatibilityMode:=15
      
      oWordDoc.ExportAsFixedFormat OutputFileName:=sPath & sFileNamePDF, _
                                    ExportFormat:=wdExportFormatPDF, _
                                    OpenAfterExport:=False, _
                                    OptimizeFor:=wdExportOptimizeForPrint, _
                                    Range:=wdExportAllDocument, _
                                    Item:=wdExportDocumentContent, _
                                    IncludeDocProps:=True, _
                                    KeepIRM:=True, _
                                    CreateBookmarks:=wdExportCreateNoBookmarks, _
                                    DocStructureTags:=True, _
                                    BitmapMissingFonts:=True, _
                                    UseISO19005_1:=False
      oWordApp.Quit
      
      Set IstruzioniPDF = .Worksheets(sNomeFoglioIstruzioni) _
                          .Shapes.AddOLEObject(FileName:=sPath & sFileNamePDF, _
                                               Link:=False, _
                                               DisplayAsIcon:=True, _
                                               IconIndex:=0, _
                                               IconLabel:="Istruzioni PDF", _
                                               IconFileName:=sPathPdfIco)
      
      Set IstruzioniWord = .Worksheets(sNomeFoglioIstruzioni).Shapes("Istruzioni")
      
      Dim iTop As Double, iLeft As Double
      With IstruzioniWord
         iTop = .Top
         iLeft = .Left + .Width + 10
      End With
      
      With IstruzioniPDF
         .Name = "IstruzioniPDF"
         .Top = iTop
         .Left = iLeft
         With .OLEFormat.Object
            .Placement = xlMoveAndSize
            .PrintObject = False
            .Select
            Selection.OnAction = "CreaIstruzioniPDF"
            ActiveCell.Select
         End With
      End With
   End With ' ThisWorkbook
   Set oWordApp = Nothing
   Set oWordDoc = Nothing
   
End Sub

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VBA MACRO M2_Comandi_Specifici.bas 
in file: /home/peter/DEV/budget/vba/xl/vbaProject.bin - OLE stream: 'VBA/M2_Comandi_Specifici'
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Option Private Module
Option Explicit

Public Const AnnoAnalisiInizialeAssoluto = 2014 'anno da non cambiare mai


Public Const sNomeFogliDaNascondere As String = "INDICI_2,GRAFICI_RELAZIONE, GRAFICI_RELAZIONE_2,GRAFICI_COMP_ATT_PASS," & _
                                                "DATIXBRL,MODELLI_WORD,LEGENDA_FORMULE_RATING_FGPMI"

Public Const bSpostaFogliStampaPDF As Boolean = True

Sub SelezionaFogliGrafici()
   Const sFogliGrafici As String = "DASHBOARD,GRAFICI_RELAZIONE,GRAFICI_RELAZIONE_2,GRAFICI_COMP_ATT_PASS"
   
   Dim arrFogliGrafici As Variant
   Dim v As Variant
   Dim w As Worksheet
   Dim crt As Chart
   Dim crtob As ChartObject
   
   
   arrFogliGrafici = Split(sFogliGrafici, ",")
   With ThisWorkbook
      For Each v In arrFogliGrafici
         Select Case TypeName(.Sheets(v))
            Case "Worksheet"
               With .Sheets(v)
                  .Activate
                  Call WsUnprotect(.Cells(1).Parent)
                  For Each crtob In .ChartObjects
                     crtob.Select
                     crtob.Chart.Refresh
                  Next crtob
                  .Cells(1).Select
                  Call WsProtect(.Cells(1).Parent)
               End With
         End Select
      Next v
   End With
   Call VaiDatiImp
End Sub

Sub ImpostaAreeReportFGPMI()
  Dim wsREPORT As Worksheet
  Dim bProtected As Boolean
  Set wsREPORT = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets("RATING_FGPMI")
    With wsREPORT
      bProtected = .ProtectContents
      If bProtected Then Call WsUnprotect(wsREPORT)
        If Not ValOptTabs Then
          .Range("FGPMI_INDUSTRIA").EntireRow.Hidden = True
          .Range("FGPMI_COMMERCIO").EntireRow.Hidden = True
          .Range("FGPMI_SERVIZI").EntireRow.Hidden = True
          .Range("FGPMI_IMMOBILIARE").EntireRow.Hidden = True
          .Range("FGPMI_EDILIZIA").EntireRow.Hidden = True
          Select Case [IndiceSettoreAttività].Value
            Case 1
              .Range("FGPMI_INDUSTRIA").EntireRow.Hidden = False
            Case 2
              .Range("FGPMI_COMMERCIO").EntireRow.Hidden = False
            Case 3, 4
              .Range("FGPMI_SERVIZI").EntireRow.Hidden = False
            Case 5
              .Range("FGPMI_IMMOBILIARE").EntireRow.Hidden = False
            Case 6
              .Range("FGPMI_EDILIZIA").EntireRow.Hidden = False
          End Select
        Else
          .Range("FGPMI_INDUSTRIA").EntireRow.Hidden = False
          .Range("FGPMI_COMMERCIO").EntireRow.Hidden = False
          .Range("FGPMI_SERVIZI").EntireRow.Hidden = False
          .Range("FGPMI_IMMOBILIARE").EntireRow.Hidden = False
          .Range("FGPMI_EDILIZIA").EntireRow.Hidden = False
        End If
      If bProtected Then Call WsProtect(wsREPORT)
    End With
    Set wsREPORT = Nothing
End Sub

Sub CancellaTuttiIDati() '<=== modificato
  Dim Risposta As Long
  Risposta = MsgBox("Tutti i dati verranno eliminati definitivamente" & vbCr & "Continuare?", vbDefaultButton2 + vbYesNo + vbExclamation, "")
  If Risposta = vbNo Then Exit Sub
  
  Call Disabilita
  Call CancellaTuttiIDatiSub
  Call VaiDatiImp
  Call Riabilita
End Sub

Sub CancellaTuttiIDatiSub()
  Dim ws As Worksheet
  Dim Graf As Chart
  Dim i As Long
  
  Application.StatusBar = "Cancellazione dati in corso. Attendere prego..."
  With ThisWorkbook
    With .Worksheets("DATI_IMPRESA")
      Call WsUnprotect(.Cells(1).Parent)
      .Range("CancDatiImpresa").ClearContents
      .Range("NoteCommenti").MergeArea.ClearContents
      For i = 3 To 5
         .Range("VarRicavi_anno" & i).NumberFormat = "0.00%"
      Next i
      Call WsProtect(.Cells(1).Parent)
    End With
    With .Worksheets("SP")
      .Range("CancDatiSP").ClearContents '.Value = Empty
    End With
    With .Worksheets("CE")
      .Range("CancDatiCE").ClearContents '.Value = Empty
    End With
    Call ImpostaAreeReportFGPMI
    For Each ws In .Worksheets
      With ws
        If .Visible = xlSheetVisible Then
          With .PageSetup
            .LeftHeader = ""
            .CenterHeader = ""
            .RightHeader = ""
            .LeftFooter = ""
            .CenterFooter = ""
            .RightFooter = ""
          End With
        End If
      End With
    Next ws
    
  End With
  Application.StatusBar = False
End Sub

Sub VaiIstruzioni()
  With ThisWorkbook
    With .Worksheets("DATI_IMPRESA")
      .OLEObjects("Object 2").Verb Verb:=xlOpen
    End With
  End With
End Sub

Sub VaiDatiImp()
Call Disabilita
  With ThisWorkbook
    With .Worksheets("DATI_IMPRESA")
      .Select
       With ActiveWindow
         .ScrollColumn = 1
         .ScrollRow = 1
         If .View <> xlNormalView Then .View = xlNormalView
         If .FreezePanes = False Then
            Range("FreezePanes").Select
            .FreezePanes = True
         End If
       End With
      .Range("DENOMINAZIONEIMPRESA").Select
    End With
  End With
  Call Riabilita
End Sub

Sub AggiornaIntestazioni() '<=== modificata
  Dim ws As Worksheet
  Dim Graf As Chart
  Dim rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi As Range
  Dim sIntestazioni5 As String
  Dim sIntestazioni4 As String
  Dim sIntestazioni3 As String
  Dim sIntestazioni2 As String
  Dim sIntestazioni1 As String
  Dim bScreenUpdating As Boolean
  Set rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets("DATI_IMPRESA").Range("PRIMO_ANNO_ANALISI")
  sIntestazioni1 = rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi
  sIntestazioni2 = "-" & rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi + 1
  sIntestazioni3 = "-" & rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi + 2
  sIntestazioni4 = "-" & rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi + 3
  sIntestazioni5 = "-" & rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi + 4
  Call Disabilita
  With ThisWorkbook
    For Each ws In .Worksheets
      With ws
        If .Visible = xlSheetVisible Then
          With .PageSetup
            .LeftHeader = "&7" & Foglio4.[DENOMINAZIONEIMPRESA] & vbCr & _
                                 Foglio4.[SEDEIMPRESA] & vbCr & _
                                 Foglio4.[CFIMPRESA]
            .RightHeader = "&7Anni: " & sIntestazioni1 & _
                                        sIntestazioni2 & _
                                        sIntestazioni3 & _
                                        sIntestazioni4 & _
                                        sIntestazioni5
            .LeftFooter = "A cura di: " & [ACURADI].Value
            .CenterFooter = "&D"
            .RightFooter = "Pag. &P di &N"
          End With
        End If
      End With
    Next ws
  End With
  Call Riabilita
End Sub

Sub StampePDF(bFascicolo As Boolean, bRelazione As Boolean)
  If fPresenzaSbilancio Then
    MsgBox "E' presente uno sbilancio nello stato patrimoniale o nel conto economico!" & vbCrLf & _
           "Controllare i dati inseriti prima di predisporre le stampe PDF.", vbCritical
    Exit Sub
  End If
  If bFascicolo Then Call FascicoloPdf
  If bRelazione Then Call RelazionePDF
End Sub

Sub FascicoloPdf() '<=== modificata
  Dim Twb As Workbook
  Dim sPath As String
  Dim sFileName As String
  Dim ArrayCaratteriVietati As Variant
  Dim i As Long
  Dim UltimoAnnoAnalisi As String
  Dim rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi As Range
  Dim arrShToPrint() As Variant
  Dim NumeroShToPrint As Long
  Dim bScreenUpdating As Boolean
  Dim NumeroSheetServizio As Long
  NumeroSheetServizio = UBound(Split(sNomeFogliDaNascondere, ",")) + 1
  Application.StatusBar = "Elaborazione fascicolo PDF in corso. Attendere prego..."
  Set Twb = ThisWorkbook
  Set rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets("DATI_IMPRESA").Range("PRIMO_ANNO_ANALISI")
  sPath = Twb.Path & Application.PathSeparator
  UltimoAnnoAnalisi = rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi.Offset(0, 5).End(xlToLeft).Value
  sFileName = Twb.Worksheets("DATI_IMPRESA").Range("DENOMINAZIONEIMPRESA").Value & _
              "_Fascicolo_Analisi_Indici_&_Rating_Anni_" & rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi.Value & "-" _
  & UltimoAnnoAnalisi
  ArrayCaratteriVietati = Array("/", "\", "?", "*", ":", "|", """", "<", ">", " ")
  For i = 0 To UBound(ArrayCaratteriVietati)
    sFileName = Replace(sFileName, ArrayCaratteriVietati(i), "_")
  Next i
  With Twb
    If IsFileOpen(sPath & sFileName & ".pdf") Then
      MsgBox "Un file PDF nominato " & sFileName & ".pdf risulta già aperto!" & vbCrLf & _
             "Chiudere prima il file per creare un nuovo fasciolo PDF.", vbCritical, "Fascicolo PDF"
      GoTo saltaPDF
    End If
    Call VaiDatiImp
    Call AggiornaIntestazioni
    With Application
      bScreenUpdating = .ScreenUpdating
      .ScreenUpdating = False
    End With
    .Unprotect PW
    'Call SpostaFogliStampaPDF
    NumeroShToPrint = ThisWorkbook.Sheets.Count - NumeroSheetServizio
    ReDim arrShToPrint(0 To NumeroShToPrint - 1)
    For i = 1 To NumeroShToPrint
      arrShToPrint(i - 1) = i
    Next i
    .Sheets(arrShToPrint).Select
    Application.Calculate
    On Error GoTo saltaPDF
      ActiveSheet.ExportAsFixedFormat Type:=xlTypePDF, _
                                      FileName:=sPath & sFileName & ".pdf", _
                                      Quality:=xlQualityMinimum, _
                                      IncludeDocProperties:=False, _
                                      IgnorePrintAreas:=False, _
                                      OpenAfterPublish:=True
saltaPDF:
    'Call RiposizionaFogliStampaPDF
    .Sheets(1).Select
    If ValOptTabs = False Then
      .Protect PW
      Call ImpostaDisplayPageBreaks3
    End If
  End With
  With Application
    .ScreenUpdating = bScreenUpdating
    .StatusBar = False
  End With
End Sub


Sub AggiornaIntestazioniDashBoard()
   Dim ws As Worksheet
   Dim rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi As Range
   Dim sIntestazioni5 As String
   Dim sIntestazioni4 As String
   Dim sIntestazioni3 As String
   Dim sIntestazioni2 As String
   Dim sIntestazioni1 As String
   Dim bScreenUpdating As Boolean
   Set rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets("DATI_IMPRESA").Range("PRIMO_ANNO_ANALISI")
   sIntestazioni1 = rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi
   sIntestazioni2 = "-" & rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi + 1
   sIntestazioni3 = "-" & rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi + 2
   sIntestazioni4 = "-" & rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi + 3
   sIntestazioni5 = "-" & rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi + 4
   With ThisWorkbook
      Set ws = .Worksheets("DASHBOARD")
      With ws
        If .Visible = xlSheetVisible Then
          With .PageSetup
            .LeftHeader = "&7" & Foglio4.[DENOMINAZIONEIMPRESA] & vbCr & _
                                 Foglio4.[SEDEIMPRESA] & vbCr & _
                                 Foglio4.[CFIMPRESA]
            .RightHeader = "&7Anni: " & sIntestazioni1 & _
                                        sIntestazioni2 & _
                                        sIntestazioni3 & _
                                        sIntestazioni4 & _
                                        sIntestazioni5
            .LeftFooter = "A cura di: " & [ACURADI].Value
            .CenterFooter = "&D"
            .RightFooter = "Pag. &P di &N"
          End With
        End If
      End With
   End With
End Sub

Function fPresenzaSbilancio() As Boolean
  If ThisWorkbook.Worksheets("DATI_IMPRESA").Range("VERIFICA_SBILANCI") < 10 Then
    fPresenzaSbilancio = True
  End If
End Function

Sub SpostaFogliStampaPDF()
  If Not bSpostaFogliStampaPDF Then Exit Sub
  With ThisWorkbook
    .Worksheets("DASHBOARD").Move After:=.Worksheets("DATI_IMPRESA")
  End With
End Sub

Sub RiposizionaFogliStampaPDF()
  If Not bSpostaFogliStampaPDF Then Exit Sub
  With ThisWorkbook
    On Error Resume Next
    .Worksheets("DASHBOARD").Move After:=.Worksheets("INDICI_RF")
  End With
End Sub

Sub VaiSitoTebe()
  On Error Resume Next
  ThisWorkbook.FollowHyperlink Address:="http://tebeni.infocamere.it/teniWeb/jsp/index.jsp", _
                               NewWindow:=True
End Sub

'< =================================================================================== >
Public Function IsFileOpen(FileName As String) As Boolean '<=== aggiunta
'----------------------------------------------------------------------'
'Questa funzione determina se un file è aperto da qualsiasi programma. '
'Restituisce vero o falso                                              '
'----------------------------------------------------------------------'
  Dim FileNum As Long
  Dim ErrNum As Long
  On Error Resume Next
  If FileName = vbNullString Then
      IsFileOpen = False
      Exit Function
  End If
  If Dir(FileName) = vbNullString Then
      IsFileOpen = False
      Exit Function
  End If
  FileNum = FreeFile()
  Err.Clear
  Open FileName For Input Lock Read As #FileNum
  ErrNum = Err.Number
  On Error GoTo 0
  Close #FileNum
  Select Case ErrNum
    Case 0
        IsFileOpen = False
    'Case 70
    '    IsFileOpen = True
    Case Else
        IsFileOpen = True
  End Select
End Function

Function StringaAnniAnalisi() As String
   Dim arrAnni As Variant
   Dim v As Variant
   Dim arr() As Variant
   Dim i As Long
   Dim str As String
   With ThisWorkbook
      With .Worksheets("DATI_IMPRESA")
         arrAnni = .Range("ANNI_ANALISI").Value
         For Each v In arrAnni
            If v <> "" Then
               i = i + 1
               ReDim Preserve arr(1 To i)
               arr(i) = v
            End If
         Next v
         StringaAnniAnalisi = Join(arr, "/")
      End With
   End With
End Function

Function NumeroAnniAnalisi() As Long
   NumeroAnniAnalisi = UBound(Split(StringaAnniAnalisi, "/")) + 1
End Function

Sub ImpostaDisplayPageBreaks()
  Dim ws As Worksheet
  For Each ws In ThisWorkbook.Worksheets
    ws.DisplayPageBreaks = Not ws.DisplayPageBreaks
  Next ws
End Sub

Sub ImpostaDisplayPageBreaks2()
  Dim ws As Worksheet
  For Each ws In ThisWorkbook.Worksheets
    ws.DisplayPageBreaks = True
  Next ws
End Sub

Sub ImpostaDisplayPageBreaks3()
  Dim ws As Worksheet
  For Each ws In ThisWorkbook.Worksheets
    ws.DisplayPageBreaks = False
  Next ws
End Sub

'----- PROCEDURE DI SERVIZIO ---

Sub NomiIndici()

   Dim sNomeIndice As String
   Dim sAddress As String
   sNomeIndice = Selection.Cells(1).Offset(0, 9).Value
   sAddress = Selection.Address
   Worksheets("INDICI").Names.Add Name:=sNomeIndice, _
                                  RefersTo:="=INDICI_SINTETICI!" & Selection.Address
End Sub

Sub Maiuscolo()
  ActiveCell.Value = UCase(ActiveCell.Value)
End Sub

'=========
Sub VerificaWsUsedRange()
  Dim ws As Worksheet
  For Each ws In ThisWorkbook.Worksheets
    Debug.Print ws.Name, ws.UsedRange.AddressLocal
  Next ws
End Sub

Sub Inserisci_SEERRORE()
  Dim C As Range
  Dim sFormula As String
  For Each C In Selection
    If C.HasFormula Then
      sFormula = Right(C.Formula, Len(C.Formula) - 1)
      'Debug.Print "=IFERROR(" & sFormula & ","""")"
      C.FormulaR1C1 = "=IFERROR(" & sFormula & ",0)"
    End If
  Next C
End Sub

Sub ImpostaCenterHorizontally()
  Const Impostazione As Boolean = True
  Dim Wb As Workbook
  Dim ws As Worksheet
  Set Wb = ThisWorkbook
  For Each ws In Wb.Worksheets
    With ws.PageSetup
        .CenterHorizontally = Impostazione
        .LeftMargin = Application.CentimetersToPoints(0.5)
        .RightMargin = Application.CentimetersToPoints(0.5)
        .TopMargin = Application.CentimetersToPoints(2.5)
        .BottomMargin = Application.CentimetersToPoints(1)
        .HeaderMargin = Application.CentimetersToPoints(0.5)
        .FooterMargin = Application.CentimetersToPoints(0.5)
        .AlignMarginsHeaderFooter = True
        .ScaleWithDocHeaderFooter = False
    End With
  Next ws
End Sub

Sub ImpostaDimensioniGraficiRelazione()
   Dim wsChart As ChartObject
   With ThisWorkbook
      With .Worksheets("GRAFICI_RELAZIONE")
         For Each wsChart In .ChartObjects
            Debug.Print wsChart.Name
            With wsChart
               .Width = Application.CentimetersToPoints(16)
               .Height = Application.CentimetersToPoints(3)
            End With
         Next wsChart
      End With
   End With
End Sub

Public Sub TimerDelay(Optional Delay As Double)
  Const vDelay As Double = 0.25
  Dim vTimer As Double
  If Delay = 0 Then Delay = vDelay
  vTimer = Timer
  Do While Timer < vTimer + Delay
      DoEvents
  Loop
End Sub

Sub testcopygraf()
   ActiveChart.CopyPicture
End Sub

VBA MACRO M3_FDU.bas 
in file: /home/peter/DEV/budget/vba/xl/vbaProject.bin - OLE stream: 'VBA/M3_FDU'
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
'Option Private Module
Option Explicit

'< =============== FUNZIONE SOMMA VALORI PER CODICI =============== >
Function SommaSeCodiceMultiplo_VD(Codice As String, _
                                  IntervalloCodici As Excel.Range, _
                                  IntervalloValori As Excel.Range, _
                                  Separatore As String) As Currency
'Versione definitiva!!!!!!
'velocità tra 0,91" e 0,95" per 500 righe
Dim strCod    As String
Dim strCodP   As String
Dim strCodM   As String
Dim vntCods   As Variant
Dim vntVals   As Variant
Dim strCods   As String
Dim curResult As Currency
Dim i         As Long
    Application.Volatile True
    strCod = Separatore & Replace(Codice, " ", "")
    strCodP = strCod & Separatore
    strCodM = strCod & "-" & Separatore
    vntCods = IntervalloCodici
    vntVals = IntervalloValori
    For i = LBound(vntCods, 1) To UBound(vntCods, 1)
      strCods = Separatore & Replace(vntCods(i, 1), " ", "") & Separatore
      If InStr(1, strCods, strCodP, vbTextCompare) Then
        curResult = curResult + vntVals(i, 1)
      ElseIf InStr(1, strCods, strCodM, vbTextCompare) Then
        curResult = curResult - vntVals(i, 1)
      End If
    Next
    SommaSeCodiceMultiplo_VD = curResult
End Function

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VBA MACRO M5_Intervalli_SP_CE.bas 
in file: /home/peter/DEV/budget/vba/xl/vbaProject.bin - OLE stream: 'VBA/M5_Intervalli_SP_CE'
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Option Private Module
Option Explicit

'<=====================================================================================================================================================>
'PROCEDURE DI SERVIZIO CHE IMPOSTANO GLI INTERVALLI DI RIFERIMENTO PER LE FORMULE PRESENTI NEL FOGLIO SP_CE_RIC DOVE SONO PRESENTI I DATI RICLASSIFICATI
'<=====================================================================================================================================================>
Sub ImpostaIntervalliNomiBilancio()
  '<--- Costanti Stato Patrimoniale
  Const sSP As String = "=SP!"
  Const iPrimaRigaSP As Long = 4
  Const iUltimaRigaSP As Long = 54
  Const iPrimaRigaSPA As Long = iPrimaRigaSP
  Const iUltimaRigaSPA As Long = 32
  Const iPrimaRigaSPP As Long = 33
  Const iUltimaRigaSPP As Long = iUltimaRigaSP
  Const sColCodiciSP As String = "K"
  Const sColSPAnno5 As String = "H"
  Const sColSPAnno4 As String = "G"
  Const sColSPAnno3 As String = "F"
  Const sColSPAnno2 As String = "E"
  Const sColSPAnno1 As String = "D"
  '<--- Costanti Dati Dipendenti --->
  Const iRigaDatiDip As Long = iUltimaRigaSP + 2
  '<--- Costanti Conto Economico --->
  Const sCE As String = "=CE!"
  Const iPrimaRigaCE As Long = 4
  Const iUltimaRigaCE As Long = 44
  Const sColCodiciCE As String = "L"
  Const sColCEanno5 As String = "H"
  Const sColCEanno4 As String = "G"
  Const sColCEanno3 As String = "F"
  Const sColCEanno2 As String = "E"
  Const sColCEanno1 As String = "D"
  Dim Wb As Workbook
  Set Wb = ThisWorkbook
  With Wb
    '<--- stato patrimoniale --->
    'colonna intera
    .Names("colCodiciSP").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColCodiciSP & "$" & iPrimaRigaSP & ":$" & sColCodiciSP & "$" & iUltimaRigaSP
    .Names("colImportiSPanno5").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno5 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSP & ":$" & sColSPAnno5 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSP
    .Names("colImportiSPanno4").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno4 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSP & ":$" & sColSPAnno4 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSP
    .Names("colImportiSPanno3").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno3 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSP & ":$" & sColSPAnno3 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSP
    .Names("colImportiSPanno2").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno2 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSP & ":$" & sColSPAnno2 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSP
    .Names("colImportiSPanno1").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno1 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSP & ":$" & sColSPAnno1 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSP
    'stato patrimoniale attivo
    .Names("colCodiciSPA").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColCodiciSP & "$" & iPrimaRigaSPA & ":$" & sColCodiciSP & "$" & iUltimaRigaSPA
    .Names("colImportiSPAanno5").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno5 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSPA & ":$" & sColSPAnno5 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSPA
    .Names("colImportiSPAanno4").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno4 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSPA & ":$" & sColSPAnno4 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSPA
    .Names("colImportiSPAanno3").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno3 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSPA & ":$" & sColSPAnno3 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSPA
    .Names("colImportiSPAanno2").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno2 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSPA & ":$" & sColSPAnno2 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSPA
    .Names("colImportiSPAanno1").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno1 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSPA & ":$" & sColSPAnno1 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSPA
    'stato patrimoniale passivo
    .Names("colCodiciSPP").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColCodiciSP & "$" & iPrimaRigaSPP & ":$" & sColCodiciSP & "$" & iUltimaRigaSPP
    .Names("colImportiSPPanno5").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno5 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSPP & ":$" & sColSPAnno5 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSPP
    .Names("colImportiSPPanno4").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno4 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSPP & ":$" & sColSPAnno4 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSPP
    .Names("colImportiSPPanno3").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno3 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSPP & ":$" & sColSPAnno3 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSPP
    .Names("colImportiSPPanno2").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno2 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSPP & ":$" & sColSPAnno2 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSPP
    .Names("colImportiSPPanno1").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno1 & "$" & iPrimaRigaSPP & ":$" & sColSPAnno1 & "$" & iUltimaRigaSPP
    '<--- dati dipendenti --->
    .Names("NUMDIPanno5").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno5 & "$" & iRigaDatiDip
    .Names("NUMDIPanno4").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno4 & "$" & iRigaDatiDip
    .Names("NUMDIPanno3").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno3 & "$" & iRigaDatiDip
    .Names("NUMDIPanno2").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno2 & "$" & iRigaDatiDip
    .Names("NUMDIPanno1").RefersTo = sSP & "$" & sColSPAnno1 & "$" & iRigaDatiDip
    '<--- conto economico --->
    .Names("colCodiciCE").RefersTo = sCE & "$" & sColCodiciCE & "$" & iPrimaRigaCE & ":$" & sColCodiciCE & "$" & iUltimaRigaCE
    .Names("colImportiCEanno5").RefersTo = sCE & "$" & sColCEanno5 & "$" & iPrimaRigaCE & ":$" & sColCEanno5 & "$" & iUltimaRigaCE
    .Names("colImportiCEanno4").RefersTo = sCE & "$" & sColCEanno4 & "$" & iPrimaRigaCE & ":$" & sColCEanno4 & "$" & iUltimaRigaCE
    .Names("colImportiCEanno3").RefersTo = sCE & "$" & sColCEanno3 & "$" & iPrimaRigaCE & ":$" & sColCEanno3 & "$" & iUltimaRigaCE
    .Names("colImportiCEanno2").RefersTo = sCE & "$" & sColCEanno2 & "$" & iPrimaRigaCE & ":$" & sColCEanno2 & "$" & iUltimaRigaCE
    .Names("colImportiCEanno1").RefersTo = sCE & "$" & sColCEanno1 & "$" & iPrimaRigaCE & ":$" & sColCEanno1 & "$" & iUltimaRigaCE
  End With
  Set Wb = Nothing
End Sub

'<=======================================================================================================================================>
'PROCEDURE DI SERVIZIO CHE IMPOSTANO IN NOMI DELLE CELLE UTILIZZATI IN FASE DI ESCLUSIVA PROGRAMMAZIONE PER IMPORTARE I DATI DAL FILE XBRL
'<=======================================================================================================================================>
Sub ImpostaNomiSP()
  Dim Twb As Workbook
  Dim wsCE As Worksheet
  Dim Frng As Range
  Dim rngOffset As Range
  Dim CurReg As Range
  Dim iOffset As Long
  Dim i As Long, j As Long
  Set Twb = ThisWorkbook
  Set wsCE = Twb.Worksheets("SP")
  Set Frng = wsCE.Range("Frng")
  Set CurReg = Frng.CurrentRegion
  iOffset = wsCE.Range("rngOffset")
  For i = 1 To CurReg.Rows.Count
    For j = 1 To CurReg.Columns.Count
      If CurReg.Cells(i, j).Value <> "" Then
        'Debug.Print CurReg.Cells(i, j).Value, CurReg.Cells(i, j).Offset(0, -8).Address
        wsCE.Names.Add Name:=CurReg.Cells(i, j).Value, RefersTo:="=" & wsCE.Name & "!" & _
                             CurReg.Cells(i, j).Offset(0, iOffset).Address
      End If
    Next j
  Next i
  Set Twb = Nothing
  Set wsCE = Nothing
  Set Frng = Nothing
  Set CurReg = Nothing
End Sub

Sub ImpostaNomiCE()
  Dim Twb As Workbook
  Dim wsCE As Worksheet
  Dim Frng As Range
  Dim rngOffset As Range
  Dim CurReg As Range
  Dim iOffset As Long
  Dim i As Long, j As Long
  Set Twb = ThisWorkbook
  Set wsCE = Twb.Worksheets("CE")
  Set Frng = wsCE.Range("Frng")
  Set CurReg = Frng.CurrentRegion
  iOffset = wsCE.Range("rngOffset")
  For i = 1 To CurReg.Rows.Count
    For j = 1 To CurReg.Columns.Count
      If CurReg.Cells(i, j).Value <> "" Then
        'Debug.Print CurReg.Cells(i, j).Value, CurReg.Cells(i, j).Offset(0, -8).Address
        wsCE.Names.Add Name:=CurReg.Cells(i, j).Value, RefersTo:="=" & wsCE.Name & "!" & _
                             CurReg.Cells(i, j).Offset(0, iOffset).Address
      End If
    Next j
  Next i
  Set Twb = Nothing
  Set wsCE = Nothing
  Set Frng = Nothing
  Set CurReg = Nothing
End Sub

Sub ImpostaNomiIndiciSintetici()
  Dim C As Range
  Dim iOffset As Long
  iOffset = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets("INDICI").Range("rngOffset").Value
  For Each C In [SubAreaImpostaNomiIndiciSintetici]
    If C.Value <> "" Then
      C.Offset(0, iOffset).Name = C.Value
    End If
  Next C
End Sub

Sub CancellaNomiSpCe()

  Const PrefissoSP As String = "SP!SP_"
  Const PrefissoCE As String = "CE!CE_"
  
   Dim Nome As Name
   
   For Each Nome In Foglio1.Names
    If Left(Nome.Name, Len(PrefissoSP)) = PrefissoSP Then
      'Debug.Print Nome.NameLocal
      Nome.Delete
    End If
   Next Nome
   
   For Each Nome In Foglio2.Names 'CE
    If Left(Nome.Name, Len(PrefissoCE)) = PrefissoCE Then
      'Debug.Print Nome.NameLocal
      Nome.Delete
    End If
   Next Nome
   
End Sub



'============================================
'============================================
'Nomi per Rating_FGMC nel foglio SP_CE_RIC
'============================================
'============================================

Sub NominaCellaPerRatingFGMC()
   Dim rngNomi As Range
   Dim rngOffset As Range
   Dim rCol As Range
   Dim r As Range
   Dim iOffset As Long
   With ThisWorkbook
      With .Worksheets("RATING_FGPMI")
         Set rngNomi = .Range("ColonneNomiPerRatingFGPMI")
         Set rngOffset = .Range("OffsetPerNomiRatingFGPMI")
      End With
   End With
   iOffset = rngOffset.Value
   For Each rCol In rngNomi.Columns
      For Each r In rCol.Cells
         If r.Value <> "" Then
            ThisWorkbook.Names.Add r.Value, "=" & r.Offset(, iOffset).Address(True, True) ', xlA1, True)
         End If
      Next r
   Next rCol
End Sub


Sub ImpostaNomiFoglio_SP_CE_RIC()
   Dim rngNomi As Range
   Dim rngOffset As Range
   Dim rCol As Range
   Dim r As Range
   Dim iOffset As Long
   
   With ThisWorkbook
      With .Worksheets("SP_CE_RIC")
         Set rngNomi = .Range("IntervalloDescrizioniSPCERIC")
         Set rngOffset = .Range("rngOffset")
      End With
   End With
   iOffset = rngOffset.Value
   For Each rCol In rngNomi.Columns
      For Each r In rCol.Cells
         If r.Value <> "" Then
            ThisWorkbook.Names.Add r.Value, "=" & r.Offset(, iOffset).Address(True, True) ', xlA1, True)
         End If
      Next r
   Next rCol
End Sub

VBA MACRO M6_Dashboard.bas 
in file: /home/peter/DEV/budget/vba/xl/vbaProject.bin - OLE stream: 'VBA/M6_Dashboard'
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Option Private Module
Option Explicit

'PROCEDURE DI SERVIZIO PER LA GESTIONE DEI GRAFICI DEL "DASHBOARD"

Sub RinominaGrafico()
  Const NomePreceddente As Long = 15
  Const NuovoNome As String = "DashBoard_RAPMIanno1"
  ActiveSheet.ChartObjects(NomePreceddente).Name = NuovoNome
End Sub

Sub ImpostaAltezzaLarghezzaGrafici()
 Dim chrOb As ChartObject
  For Each chrOb In ThisWorkbook.Worksheets("DASHBOARD").ChartObjects
  With chrOb
    .Width = 141.24 '5 cm
    .Height = 142 '5 cm
  End With
 Next
End Sub

Sub PosizionaGrafici()
  Const iRowPrimaSerie As Long = 7
  Const iRowSecondaSerie As Long = iRowPrimaSerie + 12
  Const iRowTerzaSerie As Long = iRowSecondaSerie + 12
  Const iRowQuartaSerie As Long = iRowTerzaSerie + 12
  Const iRowQuintaSerie As Long = iRowQuartaSerie + 12
  Const offSetLeft As Double = 6
  Const sColAnno5 As String = "C"
  Const sColAnno4 As String = "F"
  Const sColAnno3 As String = "I"
  Const sColAnno2 As String = "L"
  Const sColAnno1 As String = "O"
  Dim i As Long
  Dim iTop, iLeft
  With Foglio13
    Call WsUnprotect(.Cells(1).Parent)
    For i = 1 To .ChartObjects.Count
      Select Case i
        Case 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
          iTop = .Rows(iRowPrimaSerie).Top + 1
        Case 6, 7, 8, 9, 10
          iTop = .Rows(iRowSecondaSerie).Top + 1
        Case 11, 12, 13, 14, 15
          iTop = .Rows(iRowTerzaSerie).Top + 1
        Case 16, 17, 18, 19, 20
          iTop = .Rows(iRowQuartaSerie).Top + 1
        Case 21, 22, 23, 24, 25
          iTop = .Rows(iRowQuintaSerie).Top + 1
      End Select
      Select Case i
        Case 1, 6, 11, 16, 21
          iLeft = .Columns(sColAnno5).Left + offSetLeft
        Case 2, 7, 12, 17, 22
          iLeft = .Columns(sColAnno4).Left + offSetLeft
        Case 3, 8, 13, 18, 23
          iLeft = .Columns(sColAnno3).Left + offSetLeft
        Case 4, 9, 14, 19, 24
          iLeft = .Columns(sColAnno2).Left + offSetLeft
        Case 5, 10, 15, 20, 25
          iLeft = .Columns(sColAnno1).Left + offSetLeft
      End Select
      With .ChartObjects(i)
        .Top = iTop
        .Left = iLeft
      End With
    Next i
    Call WsProtect(.Cells(1).Parent)
  End With

End Sub

Sub PosizionaGrafico()
  Const sNomeCrt As String = "DashBoard_RMCanno4"
  Const iRow As Long = 8
  Const sCol As String = "F"
  Dim iTop, iLeft
  With Foglio13
    iTop = .Rows(iRow).Top + 1
    iLeft = .Columns(sCol).Left + 2
    With .ChartObjects(sNomeCrt)
      .Top = iTop
      .Left = iLeft
    End With
  End With
End Sub

Sub ImpostaFormatiCruscotti()
  Const NomeGrafico As String = "DashBoard_DashBoard_EMSCOREanno1"
  Const iLineWeight As Double = 0.25
  Dim rgbIndicatore: rgbIndicatore = RGB(200, 200, 200)  'RGB(147, 255, 255) ' RGB(147, 205, 221) 'RGB(165, 165, 165)
  Dim rgbRed: rgbRed = RGB(255, 0, 0)
  'Dim rgbArancio: rgbArancio = RGB(255, 190, 0)
  Dim rgbGiallo: rgbGiallo = RGB(255, 255, 0)
  Dim rgbGiallo2: rgbGiallo2 = RGB(255, 255, 200)
  Dim rgbVerdeChiaro: rgbVerdeChiaro = RGB(189, 255, 189) 'RGB(146, 208, 80)
  Dim rgbVerde: rgbVerde = RGB(0, 255, 0)
  Dim crtob As ChartObject
  Dim i As Long, j As Long
  With Foglio13
   Call WsUnprotect(.Cells(1).Parent)
   For j = 1 To .ChartObjects.Count
      Set crtob = Foglio13.ChartObjects(j)
      With crtob.Chart
        '<--- serie indicatore --->
        For i = 1 To 5 Step 2
          With .SeriesCollection(i)
            With .Format
              With .Line
                .Visible = True
                .Weight = iLineWeight
              End With
              With .Fill
                .ForeColor.RGB = rgbIndicatore
                .BackColor.RGB = .ForeColor.RGB
              End With
            End With
            .Points(2).Fill.Visible = False
            With .Points(3).Format
              .Line.Visible = False
              .Fill.Visible = False
            End With
          End With '.SeriesCollection(i)
        Next i
        '<--- serie spicchi colorati --->
        For i = 2 To 4 Step 2
          With .SeriesCollection(i)
            With .Format
              With .Line
                .Weight = iLineWeight
                .Visible = True
              End With
            End With
            .Points(1).Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = rgbRed
            '.Points(2).Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = rgbArancio
            '.Points(3).Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = rgbGiallo
            .Points(2).Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = rgbGiallo
            .Points(3).Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = rgbGiallo2
            .Points(4).Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = rgbVerdeChiaro
            .Points(5).Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = rgbVerde
            With .Points(6).Format
              .Line.Visible = False
              .Fill.Visible = False
            End With
          End With '.SeriesCollection(i)
        Next i
      End With
    Next j
    Call WsProtect(.Cells(1).Parent)
  End With
End Sub

Sub ImpostaPlotVisibleOnly()
  Dim crt As ChartObject
  For Each crt In Foglio13.ChartObjects
    crt.Chart.PlotVisibleOnly = False
  Next crt
End Sub

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VBA MACRO M7_GraficiRelazione.bas 
in file: /home/peter/DEV/budget/vba/xl/vbaProject.bin - OLE stream: 'VBA/M7_GraficiRelazione'
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Option Explicit
Option Private Module

'procedura interna per creazione dei grafici degli indici da inserire nella relazione

Sub CreaGraficiRelazione()
Attribute CreaGraficiRelazione.VB_ProcData.VB_Invoke_Func = " \n14"
   Const cmHeight = 2.5
   Const cmWidth = 16
   Const RiduzioneCmWidthGraficiRF As Long = 0
   Const FontSizeLabels As Long = 8
  
   Dim wsIndici As Worksheet
   Dim wsIndiciRF As Worksheet
   Dim wsGraficiRelazione As Worksheet
   Dim rngTop As Range
   
   Dim strBase As String
   Dim strXValues As String
   Dim strName As String
   Dim strValues As String
   Dim i As Long
   Dim cht As ChartObject
   Dim oAxis As Axis
   
   Dim contTop As Long
   
   With ThisWorkbook
      Set wsIndici = .Worksheets("INDICI")
      Set wsIndiciRF = .Worksheets("INDICI_RF")
      Set wsGraficiRelazione = .Worksheets("GRAFICI_RELAZIONE")
   End With
   On Error Resume Next
   With wsGraficiRelazione
      Call WsUnprotect(.Cells(1).Parent)
      .ChartObjects.Delete
   End With
   On Error GoTo 0
   'Indici Dati Bilancio
   With wsIndici
      strBase = "='" & .Name & "'!"
      strXValues = strBase & .Range("IntestazioneI").Resize(1, 5).Offset(0, 2).Address
      For i = 1 To NumeroIndici
         Select Case i
            Case 4 To 6
            
            Case Else
               strName = strBase & .Range("Indice" & i).Resize(1, 1).Address
               strValues = strBase & .Range("Indice" & i).Resize(1, 5).Offset(0, 2).Address
               With wsGraficiRelazione
                  Set rngTop = .Range("A1").Offset(contTop)
                  Set cht = wsGraficiRelazione.ChartObjects.Add(Top:=rngTop.Top, _
                                                                Left:=0, _
                                                                Width:=Application.CentimetersToPoints(cmWidth), _
                                                                Height:=Application.CentimetersToPoints(cmHeight))
               End With
               With cht
                  .Name = "Grafico" & i
                  With .Chart
                     .SeriesCollection.NewSeries
                     .SetElement (msoElementLegendNone)
                     .SetElement (msoElementDataLabelOutSideEnd)
                     .SetElement (msoElementPrimaryValueGridLinesNone)
                     With .SeriesCollection(1)
                        .Name = strName
                        .Values = strValues
                        .XValues = strXValues
                        .DataLabels.Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
                     End With
                     .SetElement (msoElementChartTitleNone)
                     Set oAxis = .Axes(xlValue)
                     With oAxis
                        .TickLabels.Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
                     End With
                     Set oAxis = .Axes(xlCategory)
                     With oAxis
                        With .TickLabels
                           .Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
                           .Offset = 0
                        End With
                     End With
                     With .ChartArea
                        .Border.LineStyle = xlNone
                     End With
                     With .SeriesCollection(1)
                        With .Format.Fill
                           .Solid
                           .BackColor.RGB = RGB(79, 129, 189)
                           .ForeColor.RGB = RGB(79, 129, 189)
                           .Transparency = 0.6
                        End With
                     End With
                  End With
               End With
               contTop = contTop + 10
         End Select
      Next i
   End With
   'Indici Rendiconto Finanziario
   With wsIndiciRF
      strBase = "='" & .Name & "'!"
      strXValues = strBase & .Range("IntestazioneRF").Resize(1, 4).Offset(0, 2).Address
      For i = 1 To NumeroIndiciRF
         strName = strBase & .Range("IndiceRF" & i).Resize(1, 1).Address
         strValues = strBase & .Range("IndiceRF" & i).Resize(1, 4).Offset(0, 2).Address
         With wsGraficiRelazione
            Set rngTop = .Range("A1").Offset(contTop)
            Set cht = wsGraficiRelazione.ChartObjects.Add(Top:=rngTop.Top, _
                                                          Left:=0, _
                                                          Width:=Application.CentimetersToPoints(cmWidth - RiduzioneCmWidthGraficiRF), _
                                                          Height:=Application.CentimetersToPoints(cmHeight))
         End With
         With cht
            .Name = "GraficoRF" & i
            With .Chart
               .SeriesCollection.NewSeries
               .SetElement (msoElementLegendNone)
               .SetElement (msoElementDataLabelOutSideEnd)
               .SetElement (msoElementPrimaryValueGridLinesNone)
               With .SeriesCollection(1)
                  .Name = strName
                  .Values = strValues
                  .XValues = strXValues
                  .DataLabels.Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
               End With
               .SetElement (msoElementChartTitleNone)
               .Axes(xlValue).TickLabels.Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
               .Axes(xlCategory).TickLabels.Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
               With .ChartArea
                  .Border.LineStyle = xlNone
               End With
               With .SeriesCollection(1)
                  With .Format.Fill
                     .Solid
                     .BackColor.RGB = RGB(79, 129, 189)
                     .ForeColor.RGB = RGB(79, 129, 189)
                     .Transparency = 0.6
                  End With
               End With
            End With
         End With
         contTop = contTop + 10
      Next i
   End With
   Call WsProtect(wsGraficiRelazione)
End Sub


'GRAFICI SINTESI
Sub ImpostaGraficiSintesi()

   Const FontSizeLabels As Long = 8

   Dim oGrafici As ChartObjects
   Dim oGrafico As ChartObject
   Dim sColl As Series
   Dim oAxis As Axis
   
   Set oGrafici = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets("GRAFICI_RELAZIONE_2").ChartObjects
   For Each oGrafico In oGrafici
      With oGrafico
         With .Chart
            .SetElement (msoElementDataLabelNone)
            .SetElement (msoElementDataLabelOutSideEnd)
            Set sColl = .SeriesCollection(1)
            With sColl
               With .Format
                  With .Fill
                  .Solid
                  .ForeColor.RGB = RGB(79, 129, 189)
                  .Transparency = 0.6
                  End With
               End With
               .DataLabels.Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
            End With
            Set oAxis = .Axes(xlCategory)
            With oAxis
               With .TickLabels
                  .Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
                  .Offset = 0
               End With
            End With
         End With
      End With
   Next oGrafico
End Sub



Sub ImpostaGraficiComposizioneAttivoPassivo()
   Const FontSizeLabels As Long = 7
   Const cmHeight = 7
   Const cmWidth = 9
   
   Const iOffset As Long = 24
   
   Dim oChart As ChartObject
   Dim oChart2 As Chart
   Dim oSeries As Series
   Dim oAxis As Axis
   Dim contOffset As Long
   
   
   For Each oChart In ThisWorkbook.Worksheets("GRAFICI_COMP_ATT_PASS").ChartObjects
         With oChart
            Call WsUnprotect(.Parent)
            .Height = Application.CentimetersToPoints(cmHeight)
            .Width = Application.CentimetersToPoints(cmWidth)
            .Top = .Parent.Range("A14").Offset(contOffset).Top
            contOffset = contOffset + iOffset
            Set oChart2 = .Chart
            With oChart2
               .SetElement (msoElementLegendNone)
               .SetElement (msoElementLegendRight)
               .SetElement (msoElementDataLabelNone)
               .SetElement (msoElementDataLabelCenter)
               .ChartTitle.Font.Size = FontSizeLabels + 1
               With .ChartArea
                  With .Border
                     '.LineStyle = xlContinuous
                     '.Weight = xlHairline
                  End With
               End With
               
               With .Legend
                  .Font.Size = FontSizeLabels - 1
               End With
               Set oAxis = .Axes(xlCategory)
               With oAxis
                  With .TickLabels
                     .Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
                     .Offset = 0
                  End With
               End With
               Set oAxis = .Axes(xlValue)
               With oAxis
                  With .TickLabels
                     .Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
                     .Offset = 0
                  End With
               End With
               For Each oSeries In .SeriesCollection
                  With oSeries
                     .DataLabels.Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
                     With .Border
                        .LineStyle = xlContinuous
                        .Weight = xlHairline
                        .Color = vbBlack
                     End With
                     With .Format
                        With .Fill
                           .Solid
                           .Transparency = 0.75
                        End With
                     End With
                     Select Case .Name
                        Case "ATTIVO: ATTIVO FISSO"
                           .Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = RGB(255, 139, 139) 'RGB(62, 108, 164) 'RGB(250, 192, 144)
                        Case "ATTIVO: RIMANENZE E REALIZZABILITÀ"
                           .Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = RGB(250, 192, 144) 'RGB(79, 129, 189) 'RGB(223, 240, 245)
                        Case "ATTIVO: LIQUIDITÀ DIFFERITE"
                           .Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = RGB(146, 208, 80) 'RGB(163, 189, 221) 'RGB(147, 205, 221)
                        Case "ATTIVO: LIQUIDITÀ IMMEDIATE"
                           .Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = RGB(159, 255, 159) 'RGB(213, 225, 239) 'RGB(195, 214, 155)
                        Case "PASSIVO: CAPITALE NETTO"
                           .Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = RGB(255, 139, 139) 'RGB(62, 108, 164) 'RGB(0, 176, 240)
                        Case "PASSIVO: PASSIVITÀ FISSE"
                           .Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = RGB(250, 192, 144) 'RGB(79, 129, 189) 'RGB(196, 189, 151)
                        Case "PASSIVO: PASSIVITÀ CORRENTI"
                           .Format.Fill.ForeColor.RGB = RGB(146, 208, 80) 'RGB(163, 189, 221) 'RGB(242, 220, 319)
                     End Select
                  End With
               Next oSeries
            End With ' oChart2
         End With
         
   Next oChart
End Sub

'-----------------
Sub ImpostaFogliGrafici()
Const FontSizeLabels As Double = 7
Dim oChart As Chart
Dim oSeries As Series
Dim oDataLabel As DataLabel
Dim oAxis As Axis

For Each oChart In ThisWorkbook.Charts
   'Debug.Print oChart.Name
   On Error Resume Next
   With oChart
      .SetElement (msoElementPrimaryValueGridLinesNone)
      For Each oSeries In .SeriesCollection
         .DataTable.Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
         With oSeries
            For Each oDataLabel In .DataLabels
               
                oDataLabel.Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
            Next
                     With .Format
                        With .Fill
                           .Solid
                           .Transparency = 0.4
                        End With
                     End With
         End With
      Next oSeries
               Set oAxis = .Axes(xlValue)
               With oAxis
                  With .TickLabels
                     .Font.Size = FontSizeLabels
                     .Offset = 100
                  End With
               End With
   End With
Next oChart
End Sub
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VBA MACRO M8_Report_Word_Pdf.bas 
in file: /home/peter/DEV/budget/vba/xl/vbaProject.bin - OLE stream: 'VBA/M8_Report_Word_Pdf'
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Option Explicit
Option Private Module

Public Const NumeroIndici As Long = 36
Public Const NumeroIntestazioniIndici As Long = 30
Public Const NumeroIndiciRF As Long = 6


Sub RelazionePDF()

   Const wdExportFormatPDF As Long = 17
   Const wdExportAllDocument As Long = 0
   Const wdExportOptimizeForPrint As Long = 0
   Const wdExportDocumentContent As Long = 0
   Const wdExportCreateNoBookmarks As Long = 0
   
   Dim strModello As String
   Dim r As Range
   Dim oAppWord As Object
   Dim oDocWord As Object
   Dim tmpPath As String
   Dim sPercorso As String
   Dim sNomeFile As String
   
   Dim wsModelliWord As Worksheet
   Dim wsDatiImpresa As Worksheet
   Dim wsIndici As Worksheet
   Dim wsAltmanRMC As Worksheet
   Dim wsFGPMI As Worksheet
   Dim wsIndiciRF As Worksheet
   Dim wsDashBoard As Worksheet
   Dim wsRatingPMI As Worksheet
   Dim wsSPCERicl As Worksheet
   Dim wsRF As Worksheet
   Dim wsSP As Worksheet
   Dim wsCE As Worksheet
   
   Dim wsGraficiRelazione As Worksheet
   Dim wsGraficiRelazione2 As Worksheet
   Dim wsGraficiComposizioneAttivoPassivo As Worksheet
   
   Dim rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi As Range
   Dim PrimoAnnoAnalisi As Long
   
   Dim i As Long
   Dim index As Long
   
   Dim strMessaggioErrore As String
   Dim strTitoloErrore As String

   Dim bWordIsOpen As Boolean
   
   With ThisWorkbook
      Set wsModelliWord = .Worksheets("MODELLI_WORD")
      Set wsDatiImpresa = .Worksheets("DATI_IMPRESA")
      Set wsIndici = .Worksheets("INDICI")
      Set wsAltmanRMC = .Worksheets("ALTMAN")
      Set wsFGPMI = .Worksheets("RATING_FGPMI")
      Set wsIndiciRF = .Worksheets("INDICI_RF")
      Set wsDashBoard = .Worksheets("DASHBOARD")
      Set wsSPCERicl = .Worksheets("SP_CE_RIC")
      Set wsRF = .Worksheets("RENDICONTO_FINANZIARIO")
      Set wsGraficiRelazione = .Worksheets("GRAFICI_RELAZIONE")
      Set wsGraficiRelazione2 = .Worksheets("GRAFICI_RELAZIONE_2")
      Set wsGraficiComposizioneAttivoPassivo = .Worksheets("GRAFICI_COMP_ATT_PASS")
      Set wsSP = .Worksheets("SP")
      Set wsCE = .Worksheets("CE")
      sPercorso = .Path
      If Right(sPercorso, 1) <> Application.PathSeparator Then
         sPercorso = sPercorso & Application.PathSeparator
      End If
   End With
   
   Set rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets("DATI_IMPRESA").Range("PRIMO_ANNO_ANALISI")
   sPercorso = ThisWorkbook.Path & Application.PathSeparator
   PrimoAnnoAnalisi = rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi.Value
   sNomeFile = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets("DATI_IMPRESA").Range("DENOMINAZIONEIMPRESA").Value & _
               "_Relazione_Analisi_Indici_&_Rating_Anni_" & rngPrimoAnnoAnalisi.Value & "-" _
   & PrimoAnnoAnalisi
   sNomeFile = SostituisciCaratteriVietatiNomiFile(sNomeFile) & ".pdf"
   
   If IsFileOpen(sPercorso & sNomeFile) Then
      strMessaggioErrore = "Un file con nome " & sNomeFile & " risulta già aperto." & vbNewLine & _
                           "Chiudere il file prima di creare una nuova relazione PDF."
      strTitoloErrore = "Errore Creazione Relazione PDF"
      MsgBox strMessaggioErrore, vbCritical, strTitoloErrore
      GoTo RiprendiErrori
   End If
   
   For Each r In wsModelliWord.ListObjects("ModelloReport").DataBodyRange.Cells
      strModello = strModello & r.Value
   Next r
   
   tmpPath = Environ("Temp") & Application.PathSeparator
   Call Decodifica_Base64Binary(strModello, tmpPath & sNomeFileModello)
   
   Application.StatusBar = "Elaborazione relazione PDF in corso. Attendere prego..."
   Call Disabilita
   
   With wsGraficiRelazione2
      Call WsUnprotect(.Cells(1).Parent)
      If NumeroAnniAnalisi = 2 Then
         '.Range("ColonneGraficiRelazione2VariazionePercentuale").EntireColumn.Hidden = True
      Else
         .Range("ColonneGraficiRelazione2VariazionePercentuale").EntireColumn.Hidden = False
      End If
   End With
   
   'Set oAppWord = CreateObject("Word.Application")
      On Error Resume Next
      Set oAppWord = GetObject(, "Word.Application")
      If Err.Number <> 0 Then
         Err.Clear
         Set oAppWord = CreateObject("Word.Application")
      Else
         bWordIsOpen = True
      End If
      On Error GoTo 0
   
   
   
   With oAppWord
      .Visible = ValOptTabs
      Set oDocWord = .Documents.Add(Template:=tmpPath & sNomeFileModello, NewTemplate:=False, DocumentType:=0)
      With oDocWord
         'Denominazione copertina
         With .BookMarks("Denominazione0").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Text = wsDatiImpresa.Range("DENOMINAZIONEIMPRESA").Value
         End With
          With .BookMarks("Denominazione1").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Text = wsDatiImpresa.Range("DENOMINAZIONEIMPRESA").Value
         End With
        
         'Esercizi elaborati
         With .BookMarks("EserciziElaborati").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Text = StringaAnniAnalisi
         End With
         
         'Elaborazione a cura di
         With .BookMarks("ElaborazioneACuraDi").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Text = wsDatiImpresa.Range("ACURADI").Value
         End With
         With .BookMarks("ElaborazioneACuraDi1").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Text = wsDatiImpresa.Range("ACURADI").Value
         End With
         
         ' Data Elaborazione
         With .BookMarks("DataElaborazione").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Text = Date
         End With
         
         'Denominazione Dati Società
         With .BookMarks("Denominazione").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Text = wsDatiImpresa.Range("DENOMINAZIONEIMPRESA").Value
         End With
         
         'Sede
         With .BookMarks("Sede").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Text = wsDatiImpresa.Range("SEDEIMPRESA").Value
         End With
         
         'Codice Ficale Numero Rea
         With .BookMarks("CFREA").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Text = wsDatiImpresa.Range("CFIMPRESA").Value
         End With
         
         'Settore Attività
         With .BookMarks("SettoreAttività").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Text = wsDatiImpresa.Range("SETTATT").Value
         End With
         
         'Note e commenti
         With .BookMarks("NoteCommenti").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Text = wsDatiImpresa.Range("NoteCommenti").Value
         End With
         
         'DASHBOARD
         wsDashBoard.Range("DASHBOARD").CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
         Call TimerDelay
         With .BookMarks("DASHBOARD").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Paste
         End With
         With .InlineShapes(1)
            .LockAspectRatio = msoTrue
            .ScaleHeight = 65 '73
         End With
         
         'GRAFICI COMPOSIZIONE ATTIVO PASSIVO
         For i = 1 To 5
            wsGraficiComposizioneAttivoPassivo.ChartObjects("GraficoComposizioneAttivoPassivoAnno" & i).CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
            Call TimerDelay
            With .BookMarks("GraficoComposizioneAttivoPassivoAnno" & i).Range
               .HighlightColorIndex = 0
               .Paste
            End With
         Next i
         
         'GRAFICI SINTESI
         For i = 1 To 9
            wsGraficiRelazione2.Range("GraficiSintesi" & i).CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
            Call TimerDelay
            With .BookMarks("GraficiSintesi" & i).Range
               .HighlightColorIndex = 0
               .Paste
            End With
         Next i
         
         'ALTMAN
         wsAltmanRMC.Range("INDICE_DI_ALTMAN").CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
         Call TimerDelay
         With .BookMarks("INDICE_DI_ALTMAN").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Paste
         End With
         
         'EM-SCORE
         wsAltmanRMC.Range("INDICE_EMSCORE").CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
         Call TimerDelay
         With .BookMarks("INDICE_EM_SCORE").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Paste
         End With
         
         'FGPMI
         index = wsDatiImpresa.Range("IndiceSettoreAttivitàFGPMI").Value
         wsFGPMI.Range("TabellaFGPMI" & index).CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
         Call TimerDelay
         With .BookMarks("TabellaFGPMI").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Paste
         End With
         
         'Intestazioni Indici
         wsIndici.Range("IntestazioneI").CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
         Call TimerDelay
         For i = 1 To NumeroIntestazioniIndici
            With .BookMarks("IntestazioneI" & i).Range
               .HighlightColorIndex = 0
               .Paste
            End With
         Next i
         
         'Indici
         For i = 1 To NumeroIndici
            Select Case i
               Case 32
               
               Case Else
                  wsIndici.Range("Indice" & i).CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
                  Call TimerDelay
                  With .BookMarks("Indice" & i).Range
                     .HighlightColorIndex = 0
                     .Paste
                  End With
            End Select
            
            
            Select Case i
               Case 4 To 6
                  'NESSUN GRAFICO
               
               Case 32, Is > 34
                  'NESSUN GRAFICO
                  
               Case Else
                  wsGraficiRelazione.ChartObjects("Grafico" & i).CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
                  Call TimerDelay
                  With .BookMarks("Grafico" & i).Range
                     .HighlightColorIndex = 0
                     .Paste
                  End With
            End Select
         Next i
         
         'Intestazioni RF
         wsIndiciRF.Range("IntestazioneRF").CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
         Call TimerDelay
         For i = 1 To NumeroIndiciRF
            With .BookMarks("IntestazioneRF" & i).Range
               .HighlightColorIndex = 0
               .Paste
            End With
         Next i
         
         'Indici RF
         For i = 1 To NumeroIndiciRF
            wsIndiciRF.Range("IndiceRF" & i).CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
            Call TimerDelay
            With .BookMarks("IndiceRF" & i).Range
               .HighlightColorIndex = 0
               .Paste
            End With
            wsGraficiRelazione.ChartObjects("GraficoRF" & i).CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
            Call TimerDelay
            With .BookMarks("GraficoRF" & i).Range
               .HighlightColorIndex = 0
               .Paste
            End With
         Next i
         
         'Stato Patrimoniale
         wsSP.Range("Stato_Patrimoniale").CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
         Call TimerDelay
         With .BookMarks("StatoPatrimoniale").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Paste
         End With
         
         'Conto Economico
         wsCE.Range("Conto_Economico").CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
         Call TimerDelay
         With .BookMarks("ContoEconomico").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Paste
         End With
         
         'Variabili scenari
         wsDatiImpresa.Range("VariabiliScenari").CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
         Call TimerDelay
         With .BookMarks("VariabiliScenari").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Paste
         End With
         
         'Stato Patrimoniale Riclassificato
         wsSPCERicl.Range("StatoPatrimonialeRiclassificato").CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
         Call TimerDelay
         With .BookMarks("StatoPatrimonialeRiclassificato").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Paste
         End With
         
         'Conto Economico Riclassificato
         wsSPCERicl.Range("ContoEconomicoRiclassificato").CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
         Call TimerDelay
         With .BookMarks("ContoEconomicoRiclassificato").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Paste
         End With
         
         wsRF.Range("RendicontoFinanziario").CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
         Call TimerDelay
         With .BookMarks("RendicontoFinanziario").Range
            .HighlightColorIndex = 0
            .Paste
         End With
         
         .Fields.Update
         
         Application.CutCopyMode = False
           
         'On Error GoTo GestisciErrori
         If oAppWord.Visible = False Then
            .ExportAsFixedFormat OutputFileName:=sPercorso & sNomeFile, _
                                 ExportFormat:=wdExportFormatPDF, _
                                 OpenAfterExport:=True, _
                                 OptimizeFor:=wdExportOptimizeForPrint, _
                                 Range:=wdExportAllDocument, _
                                 Item:=wdExportDocumentContent, _
                                 IncludeDocProps:=True, _
                                 KeepIRM:=True, _
                                 CreateBookmarks:=wdExportCreateNoBookmarks, _
                                 DocStructureTags:=True, _
                                 BitmapMissingFonts:=True, _
                                 UseISO19005_1:=False ', From:=1, To:=1
         End If
      End With
      
   End With
RiprendiErrori:
   On Error Resume Next
   With wsGraficiRelazione2
      .Range("ColonneGraficiRelazione2VariazionePercentuale").EntireColumn.Hidden = False
      Call WsProtect(.Cells(1).Parent)

   End With
   If oAppWord.Visible = False Then
      oDocWord.Close False
      If bWordIsOpen = False Then oAppWord.Quit
   End If
   If bWordIsOpen Then oAppWord.Visible = True
   Kill tmpPath & sNomeFileModello
   Set oDocWord = Nothing
   Set oAppWord = Nothing
   Call Riabilita
   Application.StatusBar = False
Exit Sub
GestisciErrori:
   Select Case Err.Number
      Case -2147018887, -2147467259
         strMessaggioErrore = "Un file con nome " & sNomeFile & " risulta già aperto." & vbNewLine & _
                              "Chiudere il file prima di creare una nuova relazione PDF."
         strTitoloErrore = "Errore Creazione Relazione PDF"
      Case Else
         strMessaggioErrore = "Errore VBA imprevisto!" & vbNewLine & _
                              "Errore n. " & Err.Number & vbNewLine & _
                              Err.Description
         strTitoloErrore = "Errore VBA"
   End Select
   MsgBox strMessaggioErrore, vbCritical, strTitoloErrore
   Resume RiprendiErrori:
End Sub


Function SostituisciCaratteriVietatiNomiFile(str As String) As String
  Dim i As Long
  Dim ArrayCaratteriVietati As Variant
  Const CarattereSostitutivo As String = "_"
  ArrayCaratteriVietati = Array("\", "/", ":", "?", """", "<", ">", "|", " ")
  For i = LBound(ArrayCaratteriVietati) To UBound(ArrayCaratteriVietati)
    str = Replace(str, ArrayCaratteriVietati(i), CarattereSostitutivo)
  Next i
  SostituisciCaratteriVietatiNomiFile = str
End Function

Sub test()
With ThisWorkbook
   With .Worksheets("GRAFICI_RELAZIONE_2")
      .Range("GraficiSintesi2").CopyPicture Appearance:=xlPrinter, Format:=xlPicture
   End With
End With
End Sub
